items.prTitle: extension tweaks
items.body:
I think we need to add 

```
enabled: !!connectedAddress,
```

to the `useScaffoldEventHistory` hook params. If not, I'm getting ALL the flags when I'm on optimism and no wallet connected. (I guess minter = null means all the minter addresses :D)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/495c292b-2d2b-4694-8bf3-e4cd868fe2b6)
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: extension tweaks
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: extension tweaks
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: extension tweaks
items.body:
```
No encrypted key found, make sure to generate (`yarn generate`) or import account (`yarn account:import`) first b
y going to root directory and running this commands
```

Are missing an extra `../`? I think we need to go 2 levels up: proxy & scripts
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: Add season2 contracts and challenge pages
items.body:
What do you think about moving these inside a `season2` folder? I think we'd only need to change the import routes.

For consistency we could also create `season1` folder + rename the challenges.

---

None of the above is critical, but I personally like to have them organized (thinking about future editions too)
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: Add season2 contracts and challenge pages
items.body:

we could keep this file on the contracts root

items.prTitle: Add season2 contracts and challenge pages
items.body:
I think this won't work when we go live. The contract form Season1 is already deployed and it seems that we didn't commit the `artifacts` to the repo

Maybe we hardcode the address when network != localhost?
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: Add season2 contracts and challenge pages
items.body:
Not critical, but I think we could have a friendlier URL?

[seasonName]/challenge/[number]
or
season[season]/challenge/[number]

bangkok/challenge/1
buenos-aires/challenge/1

or

season1/challenge/1
season2/challenge/1

---

I personally prefer option 1 with the name... but it depends how we use it in the rest of the project (1 is more pragmatic that Bankok, but it less cooler :D)
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: PR #39
items.body: Looking pretty good!! Thanks Port <3 Some things that I see. 1. Let's add a bit more space between the start and the begining of the columns. At least something like this 2. Let's place the tooltip in another position. Usually you hover the challenges from top to bottom. It's a bit weird to just run over the tooltip when hovering (and also hides the next item). Maybe on the right? 3. I think we could have better descriptions for the tootlip. I think we can be more specific about what you are going to learn / need to apply. (we can also remove the "mint your flag", "interact with challenge X", etc). IF not, it feels a bit vague? Some examples: "Mint your flag in this unverified contract." => "Analyze the bytecode of a unverified contract" or just "bytecode on unverified contract" "Mint your flag using the right signature." => "Craft a signature of a known PK" or just "Crafting signatures" Really open on this one, what do you think? We can also update the descriptions in another PRs. cc @portdeveloper @damianmarti
items.author: carletex

items.prTitle: PR #39
items.body:
Thanks! After tinkering a bit, moved the tooltip on the left.

Regarding the tooltip descriptions:
- I think we should have better ones. If not, they don't add much.

In any case, let's merge this for now!
items.author: carletex
